verses.verse: After this <S%H310><s%> it happened, <S%H1732><s%> that David struck <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and subdued <S%H3665><s%> them, <S%H3947><s%> and took Gath <S%H1661><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>
He struck <S%H5221><s%> Moab; <S%H4124><s%> and the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> became servants <S%H5650><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> and brought <S%H5375><s%> tribute. <S%H4503><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> Hadadezer <S%H1928><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%> to Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> as he went <S%H3212><s%> to establish <S%H5324><s%> his dominion <S%H3027><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates. <S%H6578><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> from him one thousand <S%H505><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen; <S%H376><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> hamstrung <S%H6131><s%> all the chariot <S%H7393><s%> horses, <S%H3498><s%> but reserved of them for one hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots. <S%H7393><s%>
When the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadadezer king of Zobah, David struck of the Syrians twenty-two thousand men.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> garrisons in Syria <S%H758><s%> of Damascus; <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians became servants <S%H5650><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> and brought <S%H5375><s%> tribute. <S%H4503><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave victory <S%H3467><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> wherever he went. <S%H1980><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the shields <S%H7982><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> that were on the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Hadadezer, <S%H1928><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

From Tibhath <S%H2880><s%> and from Cun, <S%H3560><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Hadadezer, <S%H1928><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> with which Solomon <S%H8010><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

When Tou <S%H8583><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> all the army <S%H2428><s%> of Hadadezer <S%H1928><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah, <S%H6678><s%>

he sent <S%H7971><s%> Hadoram <S%H1913><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> to Greet <S%H7592><s%> him, <S%H7965><s%> and to bless <S%H1288><s%> him, <S%H3898><s%> because he had fought against Hadadezer <S%H1928><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> him; <S%H1928><s%> (for Hadadezer had wars <S%H376><s%> with Tou; <S%H8583><s%>) and he had with him all kinds of vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass. <S%H5178><s%>

King <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> also dedicated <S%H6942><s%> these to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with the silver <S%H3701><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%> that he carried <S%H5375><s%> away from all the nations; <S%H1471><s%> from Edom, <S%H123><s%> and from Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and from the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and from Amalek. <S%H6002><s%>

Moreover Abishai <S%H52><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> of the Edomites <S%H123><s%> in the Valley <S%H1516><s%> of Salt <S%H4417><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

He put <S%H7760><s%> garrisons <S%H5333><s%> in Edom; <S%H123><s%> and all the Edomites <S%H123><s%> became servants <S%H5650><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave victory <S%H3467><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> wherever he went. <S%H1980><s%>
David <S%H1732><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> over all Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he executed <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to all his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> was over the army; <S%H6635><s%> and Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud <S%H286><s%> was recorder; <S%H2142><s%>

and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiathar, <S%H54><s%> were priests; <S%H3548><s%> and Shavsha <S%H7798><s%> was scribe; <S%H5608><s%>

and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> was over the Cherethites <S%H3774><s%> and the Pelethites; <S%H6432><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> were chief <S%H7223><s%> about <S%H3027><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>
